# devgru <img src="man/figures/devgru_logo.png" align="right" width="500" />

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A developmental `R` environment for a variety of `GenomicRanges` utilities

## Installation

You can install the development version of devgru from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("pblaney/devgru")
```
